text:
In the course of finding such a plan, no less than fifty-eight
persons were consulted. Each state in the six-state region was
represented in this group which was comprised of educational
leaders, state officials, community leaders, technical personnel,
business and labor leaders, religious leaders and legal experts.
A partial list of these consultants forms an Appendix to this plan.
All of these consultants, without exception, approved the principles
embodied in the following plan.
